description:
With the badge of this award, you gain access to the 3rd NFT Airdrop game of the "Magic Voodoo Dolls" OG collection. 200 people can own one of these badges, there will only be 1 NFT that is airdropped to these 200 people. To get the airdrop you need to retweet the corresponding tweet and hold one of these badges.

Also, check out our "Magic Meme Money Meme OG Legend Award" with a 20x higher chance of winning: https://soonaverse.com/award/0x9253aa15277a94f5009b62aec098cd70dbbea9a5/overview
name: 3rd airdrop of the "Magic Voodoo Dolls" OG collection
